dataUnits

Interface IDataUnitDoc

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDataUnit, IReadable, IReadableXML, ISaveableXML
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DocumentBase

    public interface IDataUnitDoc
extends IDataUnit
    Base interface for all documents
    Author:
    Pdz
